function waitForChild(parent, childName) while not parent:FindFirstChild(childName) do parent.ChildAdded:wait() end return parent[childName] end

local Tool = script.Parent local Drums = Tool.Handle
local myCharacter local myHumanoid local Torso local TorsoWeld local RightArm local LeftArm local RightGrip
local ReadyBongos local LeftBongoLowHit local LeftBongoHighHit local RightBongoLowHit local RightBongoHighHit
local LeftBongoLowSound local LeftBongoHighSound local RightBongoLowSound local RightBongoHighSound
local TimeTillEnabled local WaitScript
--local SongSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("SongSound") local waitTime = 0 local timeWaited = 0 local stepTime = 0.1
local randNum
local gripCo
local soundTable local animTable local armTable
-- What, isn't this standard music notation? local song1String = "mxjbxjmxmxjbxjmxmxjbxjmxmxjbhxhxmxjbxjmxmxjbxjmxmxjbxjmxm" local song2String = "bbbbbbbxxmxxjxxjxxmxjmxxbbbbbbbxxmxxjxxmxxhxxxxxbbbbbbbxxmmmjxxbbbh" local song3String = "mmbmhmbjmmbmhmbjmmhmmbmmjmmbmmhmhmbmjmbjmhbmjmbjhmbmjmbjmbbbh"
function reformGrip() myCharacter = Tool.Parent Torso = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") RightArm = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if RightArm then RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") end
if Torso then if RightGrip then RightGrip:Remove() end if not Torso:FindFirstChild("BongoDrumsTorsoWeld") then Drums.CanCollide = false TorsoWeld = Instance.new("Weld") TorsoWeld.Part0 = Torso TorsoWeld.Part1 = Drums TorsoWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 1.3, 0.5) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) TorsoWeld.Name = "BongoDrumsTorsoWeld" TorsoWeld.Parent = game.Workspace end end end
function play(key) local lowKey = key:lower()
local HitAnim = animTable[lowKey] local HitSound = soundTable[lowKey] local HitArm = armTable[lowKey] -- We can't play with an absent arm, hence this check.
if HitSound and HitArm then if HitAnim then HitAnim:Play() end HitSound:Play() end end
function playSong(str) -- Each letter in the song string represents a different sound (or lack thereof), so we -- iterate through the string to play a song. local length = string.len(str) for i = 1, length do play(string.sub(str, i, i)) wait(2/15) end end
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false local randNum = math.random() if (randNum > 2/3) then playSong(song1String) elseif (randNum > 1/3) then playSong(song2String) else playSong(song3String) end Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped(mouse) if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(play) end
myCharacter = Tool.Parent -- Load animation nao, so we don't have to do it every time we play a note. myHumanoid = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then ReadyBongos = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitForChild(Tool, "ReadyBongos")) LeftBongoLowHit = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitForChild(Tool, "LeftBongoLowHit")) LeftBongoHighHit = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitForChild(Tool, "LeftBongoHighHit")) RightBongoLowHit = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitForChild(Tool, "RightBongoLowHit")) RightBongoHighHit = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(waitForChild(Tool, "RightBongoHighHit")) end
-- Same with sounds. LeftBongoLowSound = waitForChild(Drums, "LeftBongoLowSound") LeftBongoHighSound = waitForChild(Drums, "LeftBongoHighSound") RightBongoLowSound = waitForChild(Drums, "RightBongoLowSound") RightBongoHighSound = waitForChild(Drums, "RightBongoHighSound")
-- And all the tables! RightArm = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") LeftArm = myCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm")
soundTable = { ["b"] = LeftBongoLowSound, ["h"] = LeftBongoHighSound, ["m"] = RightBongoLowSound, ["j"] = RightBongoHighSound }
armTable = { ["b"] = LeftArm, ["h"] = LeftArm, ["m"] = RightArm, ["j"] = RightArm }
animTable = { ["b"] = LeftBongoLowHit, ["h"] = LeftBongoHighHit, ["m"] = RightBongoLowHit, ["j"] = RightBongoHighHit }
-- Break right grip, and weld bongos to torso instead. if RightArm then RightArm.ChildAdded:connect(function(child) if child.Name == "RightGrip" then -- Take THAT, RightGrip! reformGrip() end end) end reformGrip()
-- And play the animation that gets us in position to play. if ReadyBongos then ReadyBongos:Play() end end
function onUnequipped() -- Stop ready anim. if ReadyBongos then ReadyBongos:Stop() end -- And delete everything in the tables. soundTable = {} animTable = {}
-- Break weld, and (if it was backspaced) get scary bongos away from us and re-enable the tool. TorsoWeld.Parent = nil if Tool.Parent == game.Workspace then Tool.Enabled = true if Torso then Drums.Position = Torso.Position + 8 * Torso.CFrame.lookVector + Vector3.new(0, 5, 0) else Drums.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0) end end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
